Each week I'll provide 5 to 10 minutes of raw video from my jiu jitsu class demonstrating various techniques (usually 3 to 5 different techniques for the week). These need to be cut, edited, and captioned with CapCut Auto-Caption into individual technique videos in 9:16 format.

CapCut doesn't always interpret the captions correctly with sport-specific terms for Jiu Jitsu (e.g., cross collar, lapel, Gi, etc) so the candidate we're looking for also practices Jiu Jitsu so they can correctly correct these autocaptions. Please only apply if you currently practice Jiu Jitsu (send a picture of proof in your application along with example work).

I've been doing these edits myself and it should not take more than an hour per week.

p.s. CapCut Auto Caption style is shown in attachment.

Hourly Range: $10.00-$20.00
